name: GiftoLexia
description: GiftoLexia is a startup aimed towards helping dyslexic children, it is incubated in NSRCEL, IIM, Bangalore. The app provides a list of relevant resources which aide government teachers in teaching dyslexic students.

name: ASL Hand Gesture Classifier
description: Allows a user to POST JSON data of a sign language hand gesture video to a url and receive a JSON response containing the classification gestures of four different machine learning models. Built using: Python and Flask.

name: Stress Down
description: Monitors the user's stress levels using data from a GSR sensor and provides recommendations based on location if the user's stress levels escalate beyond a threshold. Built using: Python and Flask.
